name: id
comment: Unique identified for the record

name: user_id
comment: Numeric User ID

name: client_id
comment: Client ID. Your QuantiModo client id can be obtained by creating an app at https://builder.quantimo.do (type: string)

name: variable_id
comment: Variable ID. ID for the variable to be tracked. Ex: 13 (type: integer)

name: default_value
comment: Default Value. Default value to use for the measurement when tracking. Default value to use for the measurement when tracking. Unit: User-specified or common. (type: number)

name: reminder_start_time
comment: Reminder Start Time. Earliest time of day at which reminders should appear. Earliest time of day at which reminders should appear in UTC HH:MM:SS format (type: string)

name: reminder_end_time
comment: Reminder End Time. Latest time of day at which reminders should appear. Latest time of day at which reminders should appear in UTC HH:MM:SS format (type: string)

name: reminder_sound
comment: Reminder Sound. String identifier for the sound to accompany the reminder. String identifier for the sound to accompany the reminder (type: string)

name: reminder_frequency
comment: Reminder Frequency. Number of seconds between one reminder and the next. How often user should be reminded in seconds. Ex: 86400 (type: integer)

name: pop_up
comment: Pop Up. True if the reminders should appear as a popup notification. True if the reminders should appear as a popup notification (type: boolean)

name: sms
comment: Sms. True if the reminders should be delivered via SMS. True if the reminders should be delivered via SMS (type: boolean)

name: email
comment: Email. True if the reminders should be delivered via email. True if the reminders should be delivered via email (type: boolean)

name: notification_bar
comment: Notification Bar. True if the reminders should appear in the notification bar. True if the reminders should appear in the notification bar (type: boolean)

name: last_tracked
comment: Last Tracked. UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss timestamp for the last time a measurement was received for this user and variable (type: string)

name: created_at
comment: Time at which the Tracking Reminder was Created At. When the record was first created. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: updated_at
comment: Time at which the Tracking Reminder was Updated At. When the record was last updated. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: start_tracking_date
comment: Start Tracking Date. Earliest date on which the user should be reminded to track in YYYY-MM-DD format. Earliest date on which the user should be reminded to track in YYYY-MM-DD format (type: string)

name: stop_tracking_date
comment: Stop Tracking Date. Latest date on which the user should be reminded to track  in YYYY-MM-DD format. Latest date on which the user should be reminded to track in YYYY-MM-DD format (type: string)

name: instructions
comment: Instructions. Ex: I am an instruction! (type: string)

name: deleted_at
comment: Time at which the Tracking Reminder was Deleted At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: unit_id
comment: Unit ID. ID of unit to use for this variable (type: integer)

name: image_url
comment: Image Url. Ex: https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/qmimages/variable_categories_gauges_logo_background/gauge-moderately-positive-relationship_sleep_emotions_logo_background.png (type: string)

name: additional_meta_data
comment: Additional Meta Data.

name: user_variable_id
comment: User Variable ID.

name: latest_tracking_reminder_notification_notify_at
comment: Time at which the Tracking Reminder was Latest Tracking Reminder Notification Notify At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.
